FOUND IN: Albania (not technically in the Balkans, but often included in this region)
Public foyers (can refer to multiple entrances to a theatre or performance venue)
And - used to connect two equal or similar elements (e.g., "I like to read books and watch movies.")
Gigi (1970) - Based on the novel by Colette, this musical follows the story of a young woman named Gigi who is being raised by her grandmother to become a courtesan in 19th-century Paris.
